import React from "react"; import { secondsToDuration } from "../../utils/duration"; import percentComplete from '../Pomodoro' export default function SessionTitle({ session, style, nextTick }) { /* TODO: This area should show only when there is an active focus or break - i.e. the session is running or is paused */ return (
{/* TODO: This area should show only when there is an active focus or break - i.e. the session is running or is paused */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) total duration */}

{session?.label} for 25:00 minutes

{/* âœ” TODO: Update message below correctly format the time remaining in the current session */}

{secondsToDuration(session?.timeRemaining)} remaining

); }
